Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI tend to suggest general feedback and sometimes even misleading. We really have to understand the matter that we are asking about to AI. However, it is very good to provide initial understanding and comparative thinking. Meanwhile, the feedback from my teachers are really significant and concerned to the matter that I require for my study.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I tend to not trust 100% the information from AI, but I trust my teachers more although sometimes I still have to cross check it.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: I don't take the information from AI at face value. I always cross check it with other sources. Although I sometimes do the same to my teachers' feedback, but I mostly work under my teachers' guidance.
